description:
A python library to aid in modeling and understanding light- and elevated temperature-induced degradation (LETID) and boron-oxygen light-induced degradation (B-O LID) in silicon solar cells and wafers

https://github.com/NREL/PVDegradationTools/blob/main/pvdeg/letid.py
https://github.com/NREL/PVDegradationTools/blob/main/pvdeg/collection.py
name: pyletid [SWR 23-40]
